Navigation link to search hashtag.

Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many imports were performed from loading a NostrScript. In source English, the first variable is the number of imports, and the second variable is 'Import' or 'Imports'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many people are following a user. In source English, the first variable is the number of followers, and the second variable is 'Follower' or 'Followers'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many profiles a user is following. In source English, the first variable is the number of profiles being followed, and the second variable is 'Following'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many quoted reposts. In source English, the first variable is the number of reposts, and the second variable is 'Repost' or 'Reposts'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many reactions there are on a post. In source English, the first variable is the number of reactions, and the second variable is 'Reaction' or 'Reactions'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many relay servers a user is connected. In source English, the first variable is the number of relay servers, and the second variable is 'Relay' or 'Relays'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many reposts. In source English, the first variable is the number of reposts, and the second variable is 'Repost' or 'Reposts'. Sentence composed of 2 variables to describe how many zap payments there are on a post. In source English, the first variable is the number of zap payments, and the second variable is 'Zap' or 'Zaps'.
Amount of money required to subscribe to the Nostr relay. In English, this would look something like '4,000 sats / 30 days', meaning it costs 4000 sats to subscribe to the Nostr relay for 30 days.
Amount of money required to publish to the Nostr relay. In English, this would look something like '10 sats / event', meaning it costs 10 sats to publish one event.
Alert message that informs a user was muted.
When a note or profile is not found when searching for it via its note id
Reacted by heading in local notification
Heading for local notification indicating a new reply

trans-unit.id: %@. Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away with zero friction.
trans-unit.source: %@. Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away with zero friction.
trans-unit.target: %@. Creating an account doesn't require a phone number, email or name. Get started right away with zero friction.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of what is done to keep personally identifiable information private. There is a heading that precedes this explanation which is a variable to this string.

trans-unit.target: %@. End-to-End encrypted private messaging. Keep Big Tech out of your DMs
trans-unit.note: Explanation of what is done to keep private data encrypted. There is a heading that precedes this explanation which is a variable to this string.

Percentage of additional zap that should be sent to support Damus development.
Fraction of how many of the user's relay servers that are operational.

trans-unit.id: You cannot post a highlight because you have selected no text on the page! Please close this, select some text, and try again.
trans-unit.source: You cannot post a highlight because you have selected no text on the page! Please close this, select some text, and try again.
trans-unit.target: You cannot post a highlight because you have selected no text on the page! Please close this, select some text, and try again.
trans-unit.note: Label explaining a highlight cannot be made because there was no selected text, and some instructions on how to resolve the issue

Part 1 of 2 in message 'You unlocked automatic translations' the user gets when they sign up for Damus Purple
Label for Your Name section of user profile form.

trans-unit.id: Your Purple subscription expires in %@ days. Renew?
trans-unit.source: Your Purple subscription expires in %@ days. Renew?
trans-unit.target: Your Purple subscription expires in %@ days. Renew?
trans-unit.note: A notification message explaining to the user that their Damus Purple Subscription is expiring soon, prompting them to renew.

trans-unit.id: Your Purple subscription expires in 1 day. Renew?
trans-unit.source: Your Purple subscription expires in 1 day. Renew?
trans-unit.target: Your Purple subscription expires in 1 day. Renew?
trans-unit.note: A notification message explaining to the user that their Damus Purple Subscription is expiring in one day, prompting them to renew.

trans-unit.id: Your Purple subscription has expired. Renew?
trans-unit.source: Your Purple subscription has expired. Renew?
trans-unit.target: Your Purple subscription has expired. Renew?
trans-unit.note: A notification message explaining to the user that their Damus Purple Subscription has expired, prompting them to renew.

trans-unit.id: Your highlight is being broadcasted to the network. Please wait.

trans-unit.target: Your highlight is being broadcasted to the network. Please wait.

trans-unit.target: Your report will be sent to the relays you are connected to

Accessibility label for zap button Button label that allows the user to zap (i.e. send a Bitcoin tip via the lightning network) the user shown on-screen Text underneath the number of sats indicating that it's the amount used for zaps. Title of notification when a non-private zap is received.
Button to send a zap.
Setting to enable vibration on zap

trans-unit.id: Zap attempt from connected wallet failed.
trans-unit.source: Zap attempt from connected wallet failed.
trans-unit.target: Zap attempt from connected wallet failed.
trans-unit.note: Message to display when sending a zap from the user's connected wallet failed.

trans-unit.id: Zap attempt from connected wallet was canceled.
trans-unit.source: Zap attempt from connected wallet was canceled.
trans-unit.target: Zap attempt from connected wallet was canceled.
trans-unit.note: Message to display when a zap from the user's connected wallet was canceled.

Button label indicating that a zap action was unsuccessful (i.e. the user was unable to send a Bitcoin tip via the lightning network to the user shown on-screen) Title of an alert indicating that a zap action failed
Text to indicate that the buttons below it is for choosing the type of zap to send.
Button label indicating that a zap action was successful (i.e. the user is successfully sent a Bitcoin tip via the lightning network to the user shown on-screen)
Button label indicating that a zap action is in progress (i.e. the user is currently sending a Bitcoin tip via the lightning network to the user shown on-screen)
Text to indicate that the app is in the process of sending a zap.

Label for filter for zap notifications. Navigation bar title for the Zaps view. Navigation title for zap settings. Section header for zap settings Setting to enable Zap Local Notification Title for section in zap settings that controls general zap preferences.
Dropdown option for selecting Apple as a translation service.
Placeholder example text for website URL for user profile.
Placeholder example text for identifier used for Nostr addresses.
No search results.
Dropdown option for selecting no translation service.

Prompt for user to enter in an account key to login. This text shows the characters the key could start with if it was a private key.
Label indicating that a form input is optional.
